thread.section_title: VapoShop Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van VapoShop | www.vaposhop.com | 9 van 106
thread.title: babaG

author: babaG
title: babaG
text:
took them 3 days to ship it, once it was shipped it arrived quick.
when I realized that the flowerrmate swift pro I ordered was no good (really bad battery and bad general performance - you are better with a light bulb and a lighter :) ) I contacted vapeshop, the team was extremely nice. the return process went fine but i got 10 euro less into my account, would have been nice to have it written in the return policy but still they made it feel very simple and the vaposhop team was kind
